title: Row - Production Examples & Patterns
description: Comprehensive real-world examples for row structure with responsive behavior, layout patterns, and visual styling

examples.name: Standard 3-Column Row - Boxed Layout
examples.description: Classic 3-column row with equal spacing, perfect for feature sections, service listings, or card grids
examples.visualDescription: Boxed 1200px wide container with 3 equal-width columns. 20px gutter space between columns (creates 20px padding on each column). Columns center-aligned horizontally, vertically aligned to top. White background, 400px minimum height.
examples.useCase: Feature sections, service listings, product showcases, team member grids, icon boxes
examples.responsiveNotes: Gutter space reduces on smaller screens (20px → 15px → 10px). Height adapts to content on mobile.
examples.layoutNotes: Each column automatically gets 33.33% width. gutterSpace applies as padding to each column.
examples.innerBlocks: Should contain exactly 3 tp-column blocks for 3-column layout

examples.name: Full-Width Hero Row with Gradient
examples.description: Edge-to-edge hero row with purple gradient background and wave shape divider at bottom
examples.visualDescription: Full viewport width, 600px minimum height, purple-to-violet gradient (135deg). White wave shape divider at bottom (80px height) creates smooth transition to next section. Content vertically centered.
examples.useCase: Hero sections, landing page headers, call-to-action banners, featured content areas
examples.responsiveNotes: Height reduces on smaller screens. Shape divider scales proportionally.
examples.visualTips: Wave shape matches next section's background color (#ffffff) for seamless transition. Gradient provides visual interest without images.
warnings: shapeBColor must match next section's background for seamless effect
stretchRow: true required for full-width content inside row
Shape divider height should scale down on mobile to avoid taking too much space

examples.name: 2-Column Sidebar Layout Row
examples.description: Asymmetric 2-column row with main content and sidebar, using space-between alignment
examples.visualDescription: Boxed container with 2 columns: main content (70%) on left, sidebar (30%) on right. 30px gap between columns. Light gray background (#f8f9fa). Columns aligned to top, space distributed between them.
examples.useCase: Blog layouts, documentation pages, content with sidebar, article layouts
examples.layoutNotes: First column should have custom width (70%), second column (30%). columnPosition: 'space-between' distributes space between columns.
examples.responsiveNotes: Columns typically stack on mobile (xs). Adjust column widths via tp-column block attributes.
examples.innerBlocks: Contains 2 tp-column blocks with custom widths (70% + 30%)

examples.name: 4-Column Product Grid Row
examples.description: Wide 4-column layout for product showcases or portfolio items with hover effects
examples.visualDescription: Boxed 1140px container with 4 equal columns. 25px gutter space. White background transforms to light gray (#f9f9f9) on hover. Subtle shadow appears on hover. Minimum 350px height.
examples.useCase: Product grids, portfolio showcases, image galleries, team sections
examples.responsiveNotes: 4 columns on desktop, typically 2 on tablet, 1 on mobile. Controlled via tp-column responsive widths.
examples.visualTips: Hover effects (background + shadow) create interactive feel for product/portfolio grids.
examples.innerBlocks: Contains 4 tp-column blocks, each 25% width on desktop

examples.name: Video Background Hero Row (Pro)
examples.description: Full-width row with looping YouTube video background and dark overlay for content readability
examples.visualDescription: Full viewport width, 700px minimum height. YouTube video plays in background (looped, muted, autoplay). Dark semi-transparent overlay (rgba(0,0,0,0.5)) ensures white text readability. Fallback poster image shown until video loads. Content vertically centered.
examples.useCase: Premium hero sections, product launches, immersive landing pages, video showcases
examples.responsiveNotes: Video background disabled on mobile for performance. Poster image shown instead.
examples.performanceNotes: Always provide high-quality poster image (videoImg) for loading state and mobile fallback.
warnings: deepBgopt: 'bg_video' required to enable video backgrounds
videoMute: true required for autoplay to work (browser autoplay policy)
Provide videoImg for loading state and mobile devices
Video backgrounds can impact page load performance - use sparingly
Test video playback across browsers - some may block autoplay
overlayBg: 1 with semi-transparent color recommended for text readability

validationRules.videoMute: Must be true for autoplay to work

examples.name: Animated Gradient Background Row (Pro)
examples.description: Full-width row with smoothly animating multi-color gradient that transitions between 3 colors
examples.visualDescription: Full viewport width, 500px minimum height. Gradient smoothly animates between purple (#8072fc), green (#6fc784), and pink (#ff5a6e) over 5 seconds. Creates dynamic, modern visual effect. Content centered.
examples.useCase: Modern hero sections, creative portfolios, attention-grabbing headers, event pages
examples.performanceNotes: Animated gradients use CSS animations - minimal performance impact compared to video backgrounds.
examples.visualTips: Use 3-5 colors for best effect. Longer animdur (5-10s) creates subtle, elegant transitions. Shorter (<3s) creates energetic feel.
warnings: deepBgopt: 'bg_animate_gradient' required for animated gradients
colorList requires minimum 2 colors, recommended 3-5 for smooth transitions
animdur in seconds (recommended 3-10 for smooth effect)
Test color combinations for text readability - may need text shadows or overlay
Avoid overly saturated colors that distract from content

validationRules.aniColor: Each color must be valid hex or rgba

examples.name: Parallax Image Background Row (Pro)
examples.description: Full-width row with image background that moves at different speed than scroll for depth effect
examples.visualDescription: Full viewport width, 600px minimum height. Background image moves slower than scroll creating parallax depth effect. Dark overlay (rgba(0,0,0,0.4)) ensures content readability. Image covers entire area with center positioning.
examples.useCase: Visual storytelling sections, feature showcases, portfolio presentations, about sections
examples.responsiveNotes: Parallax effect disabled on mobile devices for performance and UX. Shows static background instead.
examples.performanceNotes: Use optimized images (WebP, compressed). Parallax can impact scroll performance on slower devices.
warnings: deepBgopt: 'bg_image' required for image backgrounds with parallax
parallax: true enables parallax scrolling effect
Parallax disabled on iOS/mobile - provide good static fallback
Use high-resolution images but optimize file size (<500KB recommended)
bgImage.attachment: 'fixed' works with parallax
Always include overlay for text readability over images

validationRules.parallax: Set to true to enable parallax
validationRules.overlayBg: Recommended to be 1 (enabled) for text contrast

examples.name: Row with Top & Bottom Shape Dividers
examples.description: Boxed row with wave shape at top (inverted) and triangle shape at bottom for creative transitions
examples.visualDescription: Boxed 1200px container, white background. Purple wave shape at top (80px, inverted), green triangle at bottom (100px). 450px minimum height. Creates flowing visual transitions between sections.
examples.useCase: Creative section breaks, modern page layouts, visual section separation, landing pages
examples.visualTips: Shape dividers create smooth visual flow between sections. Match shape colors to adjacent sections for seamless integration.
warnings: shapeTColor/shapeBColor should match adjacent section backgrounds for seamless effect
shapeTInvert/shapeBInvert flips shape vertically
shapeTFlip/shapeBFlip mirrors shape horizontally
Test shape heights on mobile - may need to reduce for small screens
Available shapes: wave, triangle, curve, clouds, zigzag, tilt, arrow, split, book

examples.name: Centered Content Row with Border & Shadow
examples.description: Boxed row styled as elevated card with border, shadow, and rounded corners
examples.visualDescription: 1000px wide boxed container. White background, 2px solid purple border, rounded corners (12px). Medium shadow for depth (looks like floating card). 400px minimum height. Content centered within row.
examples.useCase: Feature boxes, testimonial sections, highlighted content, call-out sections
examples.visualTips: Combining border, shadow, and border-radius creates professional card effect. Subtle shadow (blur: 24, low opacity) looks modern.
warnings: openBorder: 1 required before setting border properties
openShadow: 1 required before setting shadow properties
Margin auto (left/right) centers boxed containers on page

examples.name: Full-Height Viewport Row (100vh)
examples.description: Full-width row that fills entire viewport height for immersive full-screen sections
examples.visualDescription: Full viewport width and height (100vh on desktop, fixed height on mobile). Green gradient background (45deg). Content vertically and horizontally centered. Creates immersive full-screen experience.
examples.useCase: Landing page sections, portfolio showcases, full-screen CTAs, presentation slides
examples.responsiveNotes: Uses 100vh on desktop for full viewport height. Switches to fixed 600px on tablet, 500px on mobile to avoid issues with mobile browser chrome and portrait orientation.
warnings: 100vh on mobile can be tricky due to browser address bar - test thoroughly
Consider reducing to fixed pixel height (500-800px) on mobile (sm/xs)
Avoid multiple 100vh rows in sequence - can disorient users during scroll
Test content overflow - ensure all content fits or container is scrollable
minHeight with 'vh' unit makes row responsive to viewport size

validationRules.minHeight.md: Use 100 with unit 'vh' for full viewport
validationRules.minHeight.sm/xs: Use fixed px values on mobile to avoid browser chrome issues

examples.name: Space-Between Column Layout (Justified)
examples.description: Row with columns distributed evenly with maximum space between them (justified layout)
examples.visualDescription: Boxed container with 3 columns spaced evenly across full width. First column aligns to left edge, last to right edge, middle centered. Maximum space distributed between columns. Light background, 350px minimum height.
examples.useCase: Navigation layouts, footer columns, evenly distributed content sections
examples.layoutNotes: columnPosition: 'space-between' distributes maximum space between columns. First column flush left, last flush right.

columnPosition.space-evenly: Perfectly even space between all columns

examples.name: Overflow Hidden Row (For Animations)
examples.description: Row with overflow hidden to prevent content from escaping boundaries during animations
examples.visualDescription: Boxed 1200px container with overflow: hidden. Purple border, white background. Content that animates or extends beyond row boundaries is clipped. Useful for slide-in animations or image reveals.
examples.useCase: Animated sections, image reveals, slide-in content, parallax effects
examples.visualTips: overflow: hidden clips content at row boundaries. Essential for animations that move content outside normal bounds.
warnings: overflow: 'hidden' clips any content that extends beyond row bounds
Be careful with absolute positioned elements - may be clipped
Can hide scrollbars if content is taller than minHeight
Test with actual animations to ensure desired effect
Alternative values: 'visible' (default), 'auto', 'scroll'

hero-section-row.description: Full-width hero row with gradient, centered content, wave divider

content-section-row.description: Standard boxed row for content sections

block_id.description: 4-character hex ID, never modify after creation

stretchRow.description: Makes content inside row stretch full width

columns.description: Number of columns in row (auto-creates equal widths)

gutterSpace.description: Becomes padding for each tp-column inside row
gutterSpace.warning: Large values (>50px) can cause layout issues on mobile

verticalPosition.description: Vertical alignment of column content (flexbox align-items)

minHeight.description: Prevents row from collapsing when content is short

parallax.description: Enable parallax scrolling effect for background images

overflow.description: Controls clipping of content outside row boundaries

warnings: **CRITICAL**: Never modify or regenerate block_id - causes blocks to break
Row is parent of tp-column blocks - use proper nesting structure
gutterSpace applies as padding to child tp-column blocks, not row itself
stretchRow only works when sectionWidth is 'full'
columns attribute auto-generates equal-width columns - override via tp-column widths
Video backgrounds (deepBgopt: 'bg_video') require videoMute: true for autoplay
Shape dividers (shapeTop/shapeBottom) may need color adjustment to match adjacent sections
Parallax effects (parallax: true) disabled on mobile devices
100vh height can be problematic on mobile due to browser chrome
openBg: 1 is required before setting any background properties
openBorder: 1 is required before setting border properties
openShadow: 1 is required before setting shadow properties
columnPosition and verticalPosition use flexbox - ensure browser compatibility
Shape divider colors should match adjacent sections for seamless flow

commonMistakes.fix: Always set openBg: 1 before bgType, bgDefaultColor, bgGradient, etc.
stretchRow only applies when sectionWidth is 'full'

commonMistakes.mistake: Expecting gutterSpace to add row padding
commonMistakes.fix: gutterSpace creates padding on child tp-column blocks, use Padding for row padding

commonMistakes.mistake: Using video background without poster image
commonMistakes.fix: Always provide videoImg for loading state and mobile fallback
commonMistakes.impact: Blank section while video loads, no mobile fallback

commonMistakes.fix: Limit to 1-2 full-height rows per page
Always set md, sm, xs values for heights, padding, gutterSpace
If using auto-column layout, set columns to desired number
commonMistakes.impact: Columns may not distribute as expected

commonMistakes.mistake: Using overflow: hidden without considering clipping
commonMistakes.fix: Test with actual content to ensure nothing important is clipped

bestPractices: Use semantic HTML tags (section, header, footer, article) for tagName
Always provide responsive values (md, sm, xs) for spacing and dimensions
Keep gutterSpace consistent across page for visual harmony (15px or 30px)
Test shape dividers on all breakpoints - heights may need adjustment
Match shape divider colors to adjacent sections for seamless transitions
Use columnPosition: 'space-between' for navigation or footer layouts
Use verticalPosition: 'center' for hero sections with centered content
Provide video poster images (videoImg) for loading states
Limit animated gradients to 3-5 colors for smooth transitions
Test parallax effects on actual devices, not just emulators
Use overflow: hidden for sections with animated or moving content
Combine rows to create complex page layouts (hero → features → testimonials → CTA)

layoutContext.gutterBehavior: gutterSpace value becomes padding for all child tp-column blocks
layoutContext.fullWidthBehavior: sectionWidth: 'full' creates edge-to-edge layout, stretchRow: true stretches content
layoutContext.boxedBehavior: sectionWidth: 'boxed' creates centered container with max-width from theme/settings
layoutContext.columnDistribution: columnPosition controls flexbox justify-content for column alignment
layoutContext.verticalAlignment: verticalPosition controls flexbox align-items for vertical content alignment
layoutContext.shapeContext: Shape dividers overflow row bounds to create seamless section transitions

performanceConsiderations: Video backgrounds (bg_video) increase page load time - use compressed videos and poster images
Parallax effects can impact scroll performance on slower devices - test thoroughly
Animated gradients (bg_animate_gradient) are CSS-based with minimal performance impact
Large background images should be optimized (WebP, compressed, <500KB)
Shape dividers are SVG-based, lightweight and performant
Multiple rows with complex backgrounds can accumulate performance costs
Test mobile performance separately - disable heavy effects on mobile if needed

responsiveStrategy.cascadeBehavior: Values cascade down: md → sm → xs. If sm not set, uses md. If xs not set, uses sm or md.
mobileConsiderations: Columns typically stack on mobile (controlled via tp-column responsive widths)
Reduce padding on mobile to maximize content space
Use fixed heights (px) instead of vh on mobile to avoid browser chrome issues
Disable or reduce shape divider heights on mobile
Video backgrounds automatically disabled on mobile - poster image shown
Parallax disabled on mobile - static background shown

commonPatterns.3-to-1: 3 columns desktop → 1 column mobile (via tp-column responsive widths)

semanticHTML: Use appropriate tagName values (section, article, header, footer, aside)
Avoid generic 'div' when semantic option exists
colorContrast: Ensure text over background images/videos meets WCAG AA (4.5:1 normal, 3:1 large)
Use overlayBgColor with semi-transparent dark color for readability
Test gradient backgrounds for sufficient contrast at all points
Animated gradients should maintain consistent contrast throughout animation
